Fixed each control to render with Owner object not Page object.
Fixed static GetPage method that wasn't correctly setting the reference to the global variable.
Created attribute control.
Made button control utilise the attribute control.

Implemented DOM encapsulating functionality.
Allowed the absence of HEAD and TITLE nodes in the page.
Fixed Error Handler to use page controls.

Created Input control.

Put PostBack events into BaseHasControls, with the implication that even Controls can call postback events, so if you wish to put an event onto a control within a control who's children can't be accessed (such as Grid or Repeater), you use $specialControl->AddPostbackEvent($postbackControl, array($page, $functionName))
Fixed the Preload event within controls. Now called twice -> once after Init and once after Load.
Implemented InputGroups on postback and thus the grid selectors now work.
Integrated basic AJAX support.
Working on AJAX control -> currently broken.
Added DataRow class and implemented it for datasources. Added DataRowEnumerator, and DataField.
Fixed inline code blocks to allow "this" instead of controlID, and forced parsing within Ajax control.
Pass the Ajax control to the Page_Ajax() event now. Encapsulated all calls to Ajax via that.
Fixed errorpage bug that didn't show the page when ajax was enabled.
Added Cookie, Session, Server, UrlVariable and Uri classes.
Included copyright and licencing on each file.

Fixed issue with Html controls not displaying added attributes.
Made radio and checkbox group items render the labels with the display

Added Language class and support. Needs review though.

HTML controls now have their node name in their client IDs.
